languageToPublish: Please select in which language(s) you wish to submit this record:
title: Title
titleInfo: This will appear as the title of the BCH record
typeOfResourceInfo: Select as many options as needed in order to best describe the resource(s).
author: Author(s)
authorInfo: Name of the person or organization who has authored the publication or information resource.
sourceInfo: A reference to a resource from which the present resource is derived, e.g. the name of a journal for an article published in a journal.
rightsInfo: Information about rights held in and over the resource, such as copyright holder, and availability for reproduction for educational or non-profit purposes.
resourceLinksInfo: Please always attach the relevant document(s) that will be stored in the database for users to download. When resources are available on the Internet, please also provide a link to them. Please note that attachments are preferable to links because attachments are permanently accessible whereas links can become broken.
informationResource: Information on the content of the resource
summary: Summary, abstract or table of contents (max 300 words)
countryRegionalResource: Country(ies), regional or economic group(s) covered by the resource
feywordsFacilitating: Keywords for facilitating searching for information in the clearing-houses
riskAssessmentSubject: Guidance on risk assessment of living modified organisms
riskAssessmentSubjectNotes: the function for recommending a resource as background material for the “Guidance on Risk Assessment of Living Modified Organisms” is under development.
addressModifiedOrganisms: Does this resource address one or more specific LMOs?
geneIdentificationInfo: Information on genetic elements refers to DNA sequences, including genes, regulatory DNA sequences and other nucleic acids used to create a living modified organism. They may encode a protein or may have a specific regulatory function.
keywordsRelatedAccess: Keywords related to Access and Benefit-Sharing
mccKeywords: Please select the relevant keywords for describing the content of  the code of conduct, guidelines and best practices and/or standards being submitted
keyAreas: Key areas and strategic measures for capacity-building and development addressed by the resource
keyAreasInfo: If this is resource is related to capacity-building for the Nagoya Protocol, please provide appliable option(s) from.
relevantInformationInfo: Please use this field to provide any other relevant information that may not have been addressed elsewhere in the record.
relevantDocumentsInfo: Please use this field to provide any other relevant website addresses and/or one or more relevant documents that will be stored in the database for users to download
notesInfos: The “Notes” field is for personal reference and can be seen only when the record is being edited. It will be hidden once the record is published. This field is not meant to be used for confidential information.
